attributes.action: Prohibit the use of Loss Adjusters directly employed by Insurance companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current practise of Chartered Loss adjusters being directly appointed and paid for by Insurance Companies,creates a system whereby those who are supposed to handle the claims process on behalf of the policy holder are in reality acting solely in the interests of their employer and that employers shareholders.This system is biased and unjust and only increases the distress and disruption to genuine claimants. An independant body should be established to deal with any insurance claim however caused that exceeds £1000.
